list.abs: 租船_百度百科 ... 1.航次租船（ voyage charter） 2.定期租船（ time charter） 3.光船租船（ demise charter）.

entry.def: Chartered is used to indicate that someone, such as an accountant or a surveyor, has formally qualified in their profession.
